body:
Hello! Welcome to my UHC hall of fame.

Here I will put my winners from each match!

Match #1
Gamemode - FFA Cutclean
Winner - Zegita - 3 Kills

Match #2
Gamemode - Rto4 Skyhigh, Cutclean, Supply Crates
Winner - TBD

title: Lego's UHC - Hall Of Fame

replies.body: I didn't know you had to be such a god to get 2nd place without any kills!1!

replies.body: It was more about surviving i was on 1 and 1/2 hearts for half the game and every kept dying till i was in the the top 3 i was just like 'k' ;-;
